title: Adam Scott: It's certainly not over with caddie Steve Williams
brightcove_name: Adam Scott: It's certainly not over with caddie Steve Williams
brightcove_short_desc: On SI Now, 2013 Masters champion Adam Scott discusses replacing his semi-retired caddie Steve Williams and what he looks for in a good caddie.

headline: Adam Scott: It's certainly not over with caddie Steve Williams
short_headline: Adam Scott on replacing semi-retired caddie Steve Williams

body: On SI Now, 2013 Masters champion Adam Scott discusses replacing his semi-retired caddie Steve Williams and what he looks for in a good caddie.
